alert.note: Alert for Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 1:33PM CDT until October 29 at 9:38AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Chambers Creek Near Rice affecting Navarro County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chambers Creek near Rice. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur along the creek. This will be a problem for some cattle and farm industries. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 24.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 24.0 feet. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 25.3 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening to 15.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will rise to 18.9 feet Monday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
